page.title: 19Compton Commercials Ltd.
page.content: This is an unusual site for a business which is concerned with the hiring of large commercial vehicles, ranging from 10 ton trucks to horse boxes! It was started ten years ago by the present managing director,Mr Brereton, who lives on the site. He started of by selling trucks and then repairing all sorts of commercial vehicles. He is now concerned with hiring them out but as he still has facilities for their repair he is able to undercut competitors by purchasing vehicles two or three years old. They have a total of 25 vehicles and receive contracts from as far away as Bristol and Wiltshire. During the Summer their trucks are in demand for the transporting of grain particularly. They are also an M.O.T. centre for comnmercial vehicles.
